TopicTitle: Spaceship flags unobscured by smoke sometimes.

Articles.Content:
At certain distances and angles there seems to be a drawing order problem or something, as if the flag is drawn last.

So far I only noticed this behaviour with the Rapier engine, and my own mod, which has a largely the same config file.

Happens with mods and stock parts. I tried to recreate this bug on a clean install with no mods, and the same thing happens.

I'll add the necessary information in a minute.

Version 0.25.0

Craft and save files are irrelevant. It seems to happen with any part with a flag, and the Rapier FX, in every game I tried so far.

http://www./download/tebzbship3nm172/DxDiag.zip

http://www./download/9vjgs77tkc64ypa/output_log.zip

Edited November 24, 2014 by Cpt. Kipard
Moved it for you Cpt, and yeah, odd issue, probably something to do with the shaders and the .png flags
Thanks, and yeah probably something to do with those computer things
Dammit Squad, the ARM update wasn't that important...
